messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 527
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Heather; I just had to speak up here and tell you how lucky you are. Your mother s concerns are only grounded in the fact that, in some states (SC is one. I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Heather;
I just had to speak up here and tell you how lucky you are. Your
mother's concerns are only grounded in the fact that, in some states (SC is
one. I live here.) they do take your kids if they don't like how you are
schooling them. I think I will move to Arizona. I used to live in Tuscon
(lifetimes ago). I could get used to the lack of humidity.

Brightest Blessings,
Virginia

> So the conversation continues... about "don't we have
> to do testing?" NO. "doesn't the state require every
> kid to be in school?" YES. "So if Child Protective
> Services investigates and finds out your kids are just
> playing games and not doing school...?" MOM! CPS is
> not going to take my kids away just to put them in
> school! I couldn't believe she said that!
> I still can't.
>
> Ok, rant over...
>
> peace,
> heather mclean
> tucson, AZ
>
> ...thinking ahead to November when mom & dad are
> coming to visit!
>
